official_title: A bill to permit issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel Aleutian Trawler.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for employment in the coastwise trade.

titles.title: A bill to permit issuance of a certificate of documentation for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel Aleutian Trawler.
